DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study aim estimate incidence intussusception among child < 2 year old hospital-based surveillance Singapore .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Incidence Intussusception Children < 2 Years Age Singapore
DOC.criteria: A male female infant age < 24months time diagnosis intussusception .
